channel.title: Open Science on Let's See What Happens When We Take Away The Puppy
channel.description: Recent content in Open Science on Let's See What Happens When We Take Away The Puppy

item.title: Pre-Registration
item.description: Last night I submitted my first pre-registration to the OSF.io Pre-registration challenge. The study is a Bayesian meta-analysis of studies using video game avatars to influence health behaviours and attitudes. The process involved the following: Deconstructing a previous meta-analysis Initially I wanted to learn meta-analytical methods by using previous data rather than beating my own data into submission. This was a difficult process since: the supplementary data was a pdf with that weird tendancy to select content in random patterns
